q1: What is your most passionate hobby?
a1: My most passionate hobby has to be application development, I enjoy the challenge and get huge satisfaction knowing that I have created something.
q2: And have you created anything Football related ?
a2: not creating but I'm active in my Sunday league
q3: Do you like to shoot guns and eat bacon?
a3: I do enjoy bacon but I'm a bit more of a sword guy.
a4: How to enjoy what? Bacoon? It is the universes gift to man!
a5: the pizza with bacon is the best in the world
